articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Chollima Tile Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Chollima Tile Factory
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Chollima Tile Factory.
					 He looked round the mosaics depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il newly erected in the compound of the factory and the monument to the field guidance given by them and he expressed satisfaction over the successful erection of the mosaics.
					
					 He went round the newly-built room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 He told the officials to make a new history of the factory by keeping production going at a high rate, adding that he gave an instruction to the KPA to operate the factory to which Kim Jong Il attached great importance.
					
					 Stressing the need to make the heroic working spirit displayed in the post-war period of great Chollima upsurge run high at this factory in order to supply in good time the building materials needed by great socialist construction sites, he proposed naming the factory located in Kangson, hometown of Chollima, Chollima Tile Factory.
					
					 Going round various places including adhesives and tile production shops, digital natural color spray printing room and tile exhibition, he learned in detail about the production and new products development.
					
					 He highly praised the officials and employees of the factory for displaying patriotic devotion to overfulfill this year's tile production plan set higher than any other years.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, noting that the factory is the one strictly based on Juche and a patriotic one as it is capable of keeping its production on a normal footing, unaffected by any worldwide economic upheaval and the longer one watches the factory, the more attractive and useful it looks. 
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the factory.
					
					 He instructed the factory not only to satisfactorily meet the domestic demands for tiles but further boost their production and improve their quality so that they might be exported to other countries.
					
					 He underlined the need to diversify color and size of tiles and continue directing great efforts to the work for developing new products suited to the sentiments and fashion of the Korean people and required for various uses.
					
					 He had a photo session with labor innovators, saying that the Party Central Committee firmly believes the workers of the factory would fully display the same work style and spirit as done in the period of great Chollima upsurge.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Han Kwang Sang and Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Message of Condolence to Guinean President
articles.content:
Message of Condolence to Guinean President
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of condolence to Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, as regards an unexpected accident that recently caused at the beachside concert in Ratoma, Conakry, claiming the lives of many people.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Guinean president and the bereaved families of the victims.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Farming in Taedong County
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Learns about Farming in Taedong County
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Jungsokhwa  Co-op Farm, the Township Co-op Farm and the Farm Machine Station in Taedong County, South Phyongan Province.
					 After going round various places of the farms associated with the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, he convened a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underlined the need to introduce the advanced farming methods whose efficiency has been clearly proven in practice, remarkably increase the per-hectare grain yield and put the farming on a scientific and modern basis.
					
					 Going round the farm machine station, the premier encouraged the officials and workers who are tapping internal reserves and putting the production on a normal footing and underscored the need to push forward with the modernization of the production equipment.
					
					 Prior to it, he went round the construction sites of dwelling houses in the Ryongsong-Sopho area and held a consultative meeting
					
					 He stressed the need to complete the construction of dwelling houses and improve their quality and took measures for relevant units to satisfactorily send necessary materials.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 30th Anniversary of August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 30th Anniversary of August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement by Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday, the 30th anniversary of the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement by leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Going round the Pyongyang City light industrial goods exhibition on August 3, Juche 73 (1984), he gave teachings that would serve as the guidelines in conducting the consumer goods production movement involving all masses.
					
					 Since then, a new history of the massive movement began in the DPRK and various consumer goods which were on sale at city (district) and county direct sale shops were called "August 3 consumer goods".
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, Ro Tu Chol, An Jong Su, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of the power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials and labor innovators who set examples in the August 3 consumer goods production movement.
					
					 Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet and chairman of the State Planning Commission, made a report.
					
					 The August 3 consumer goods production movement which started under the leadership of Kim Jong Il was of weighty significance in putting spurs and developing consumer goods production as it is a mass movement which helps make an effective use of inner reserves and drastically increase various consumer goods production, the reporter said.
					
					 He referred to the leadership feats of Kim Jong Il which are recorded in pages of the 30 year-long history of this movement.
					
					 Kim Jong Il established the regular guidance system so that the leading officials in charge of economy might push forward with the movement, deeply grasping its essence and taking it as one of the important tasks for developing light industry as intended by the party.
					
					 He sent a letter "On Thoroughly Carrying Out the Revolution of Light Industry" to the participants in the national meeting of light industry in June, 1990.
					
					 He took revolutionary steps to continue reenergizing the consumer goods production in the difficult period when the Korean people were compelled to make the arduous march due to the moves of the imperialists to isolate and stile the DPRK.
					
					 Very busy as he was leading the Songun revolution, he paid deep attention to producing consumer goods and saw to it that a strong wind was raised to increase them.
					
					 The reporter said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un, deeply penetrating into the significance and importance of the consumer goods production movement, set forth the tasks to produce varieties of more quality consumer goods at the national meeting of light industry on March 18, 2013.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea to further develop the consumer goods production movement into a massive work of the whole society at present when a grand advance for improving the people's living standard is progressing apace, the reporter said, calling upon all officials and other people to firmly preserve and eternally glorify the leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Leading Party Officials Visit Taehongdan Area and Mupho Bivouac
articles.content:
Leading Party Officials Visit Taehongdan Area and Mupho Bivouac
						
 Taehongdan, August 3 (KCNA) -- Leading party officials from across the country on a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu visited the Taehongdan area and Mupho Bivouac on Sunday. 
					 They toured the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 They were briefed before the mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and went round the site.
					
					 They went round historic relics, being briefed on the fact that the President advanced into the Musan area, took parental love for the people at the command log-cabin in Sinsadong, struck spark of revolution in their hearts, indicated the way for national liberation and class liberation and led them to wage a vigorous anti-Japanese struggle. 
					
					 They arrived in the Taehongdan Revolutionary Battle Site. 
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 They looked round the command post of the Taehongdan Battle and larches standing as witnesses of the battle. 
					
					 They went round Mupho Bivouac where Kim Il Sung stayed in the way of advancing into the homeland by leading the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in May, Juche 28 (1939). 
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the President held a meeting of commanding officers of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and set forth the tasks for advancing into the Taehongdan area, they went round the site of the command, the place where Kim Jong Suk prepared meals, site of campfire, etc. 
					
					 They also went round the Mupho Angling Site where leader Kim Jong Il matured his far-sighted plan for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism. 
					
					 On arrival in the Monument to the Poem at the Folk to Mt. Paektu, they were briefed on it and held a public presentation.
					
					 They headed for the Samjiyon township. 
					
					 They handed over goods for preserving revolutionary sites and battle sites and conducted various political activities among masses during the tour.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Accused of Disturbing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Accused of Disturbing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on July 31 carried an editorial denouncing the "Saenuri Party" for trying to disturb the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial recalled that the floor leader of the "Saenuri Party" on July 30 admonished the opposition party to take a responsible attitude toward a special law on the ferry Sewol according to law and principle.
					
					 This is an arrogant and shameless act as it made clear its stand to evade the political situation on the ferry Sewol disaster, the editorial said.
					
					 His remarks mean to deny the proposal of the opposition party on giving the right to investigation to the fact-finding committee, it added.

articles.title: Reunification Activist Sentenced to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Pro-reunification Activist Sentenced to Prison Term
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Seoul Central District Court on July 31 sentenced An Jae Gu, former professor at Kyongbuk National University, to three years of prison, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The fascist authorities committed such violence on charges of violation of the evil law, claiming that the pro-reunification activist controlled the movement of someone and adjusted it in the form of a report to the north and he had copies of literature benefiting the enemy.

articles.title: Papers Call for Conducting Brisk August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement
articles.content:
Papers Call for Conducting Brisk August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The start of the August 3 consumer goods production movement helped meet the needs of the people for consumer goods and give fuller play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, say newspapers Sunday in editorials. 
					 Providing field guidance to the Pyongyang City light industrial goods exhibition on August 3, Juche 73 (1984), leader Kim Jong Il kindled the torch for the consumer goods production movement. 
					
					 The movement is the mass movement which helps produce varieties of consumer goods by enlisting the creativeness of the masses and tapping inner reserves. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the movement is associated with the noble intention and immortal efforts of Kim Jong Il who always worked heart and soul to make the Korean people enjoy a happy life and provide them with more better consumer goods. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Right after its start the movement displayed great attraction. Units for consumer goods production increased across the country and housewives and pensioners fully displayed their talents and enthusiasm with new jobs helpful to the country and useful to families. 
					
					 The firm foundation of the consumer goods production provided by Kim Jong Il with his heart and soul and much effort and rich experience gained in this course serve as precious assets and might which make the DPRK dash like a wind for improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 The paper calls for making redoubled efforts with the same spirit, enthusiasm and will as done in the 1980s, producing varieties of more quality consumer goods and thus glorifying forever the immortal exploits of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu and making hurrah of socialism resound forth across the country. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls on officials and other people in all fields and units to fully demonstrate the validity and vitality of the August 3 consumer goods production movement.

articles.title: Aggressors Will Face Merciless Strike of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Aggressors Will Face Merciless Strike of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Whenever there is a sign that the inter-Korean relations improve and the situation on the Korean peninsula becomes stable, the U.S. has made desperate efforts to block the relations from improving and screw up the situation for decades, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary.
					 This suggests that the U.S. is working hard to escalate the tension on the peninsula, not defusing it and if this is left as intact, a war may break out anytime due to the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The world shows that though one is very honest-minded and just, one falls to victims of big powers if one is weak, and genuine peace is guaranteed only when one grows strong so that anyone may not provoke.
					
					 Those who encroach upon the sovereignty and dignity of socialist Korea even a bit will never get rid of the range of various ultra-precision firepower strike means of the DPRK whether they are near us or at the end of the earth and whether they are individual targets or group targets.
					
					 The further the U.S. escalates nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK, the further the DPRK will bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence. As long as the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces continue joint military exercises for aggression, the DPRK military counteraction will be put on an annual and regular basis to cope with them.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will show no mercy for the aggressors.
					
					  The aggressors in the U.S. mainland and overseas U.S. military bases should bear in mind that they will not remain alive by the powerful strike of the ultra-modern guided weapons of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Military Exploits Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Military Exploits Praised by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website articles on July 20 and 23 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 An article titled "Rare strategist" said that the victory won by the DPRK in the Korean war was a miraculous victory brought by the outstanding strategies and tactics and original military war methods of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It introduced in detail the feats performed by the gifted strategist who recorded shining pages in the modern history of war.
					
					 Another article titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" cited the facts that he shattered all the ceaseless military provocations of the U.S. imperialists, stressing that his military feats will shine forever in the world history of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 An article titled "July 27 of DPRK" noted that July 27 is a significant day for the DPRK, adding that on the day 61 years ago the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world bent their knees before the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists vaunted that they would conclude a war within a few days, believing in their numerical, military and technical superiority, and mobilized huge aggression forces but sustained a bitter defeat, it noted.
					
					 An article titled "Fate of 'ever-victorious generals'" dealt with the miserable fate of U.S. generals during the Korean war.

articles.title: Korean Armistice Agreement Should Be Replaced by Peace Agreement: Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Korean Armistice Agreement Should Be Replaced by Peace Agreement: Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 23 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Korean people brought the U.S. imperialists to their knees in the Korean war because the army and people of the DPRK turned out as one in the sacred and just struggle to defend the country from the aggression by the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the statement said.
					
					 61 years have passed since the war but the U.S. is working hard to ignite the second Korean war while persisting in its hostile policy toward the DPRK, it noted.
					
					 The Korean People's Army led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great Songun brilliant commander, will wipe out all the aggressors if the U.S. imperialists unleash a war, it said.
					
					 It noted that the only way of ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula is to have the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea, replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace one and reunify Korea independently and peacefully.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Azulejos Chollima
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Azulejos Chollima
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Fabrica de Azulejos Chollima.
					Se mostro satisfecho de que en el recinto de la planta se hayan erigido nueva y magnificamente los murales de mosaico con imagenes de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de estos grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial, acondicionada de nuevo.
					
					Recordo que el Dirigente habia encargado al EPC la tarea de gestionar la fabrica a que el mismo concedia suma importancia y llamo a escribir nueva historia de la fabrica al normalizar en alto nivel la produccion.
					
					Para producir y suministrar a tiempo los materiales de construccion necesarios a los grandes campos de construccion del socialismo, es preciso hacer dominar en la fabrica el espiritu de combate heroico manifestado en la epoca posbelica de gran auge de Chollima, dijo y propuso denominar como Fabrica de Azulejos Chollima porque esta situada en Kangson, donde se inicio el movimiento de Chollima.
					
					Dando vueltas por el taller de adhesivos, el de produccion de azulejos, la sala de imprenta digital de pulverizacion de colores, la de exhibicion de azulejos y otros puntos de la fabrica, averiguo detalladamente el estado de produccion e invento de nuevos utensilios.
					
					Evaluo altamente a los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica quienes hacen ingentes esfuerzos por sobrecumplir el plan de produccion de azulejos para este ano, elevado sin precedente.
					
					Demostro gran satisfaccion diciendo que la fabrica tiene capacidad de normalizar la produccion sin dejarse afectadas por la fluctuacion economica en escala mundial y la califico de la independiente, la patriotica y la util.
					
					El Mariscal presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Indico que la planta debe elevar la cantidad de produccion y su calidad para que pueda satisfacer la demanda nacional sobre los azulejos y exportarlos a otros paises.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de seguir prestando gran fuerza tambien a las labores para diversificar el color y la norma de los azulejos y desarrollar nuevos productos que convengan al sentimiento y gusto de nuestro pueblo y a varios usos.
					
					Asevero que el Comite Central del PTC confia firmemente en que la clase obrera de la fabrica pondra de pleno manifiesto el modo y el espiritu de lucha de la epoca de gran auge de Chollima, y se fotografio junto a los ameritados laborales de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Han Kwang Sang y Kim Jong Gwan.
